title: [Ta'Illistim, Stearriza Var]
description: The var is nearly deserted as it meanders northward toward the belltower visible against the moonlit sky.  In a nearby cottage's dooryard, a tiny garden has been cultivated, its centerpiece a small birdbath.  A trickle of water breaks the silence, burbling cheerfully as it flows down the tiny statue inside the birdbath's bowl.

The var is nearly deserted as it meanders northward toward the belltower rising above the rooftops.  In a nearby cottage's dooryard, a tiny garden has been cultivated, its centerpiece a small birdbath.  A trickle of water breaks the silence, burbling cheerfully as it flows down the tiny statue inside the birdbath's bowl.

The var meanders onward toward a nearby bell tower, which rises, lit and glowing, above the blue-tiled rooftops. Between two houses' dooryards, a tiny garden has been cultivated, its centerpiece a small birdbath.
